nodes.text: The "Blinder" 4B2 jamming array was a type of sensor jammer manufactured by Irilliad and was commonly installed on the RZ-2 A-wing interceptor. It worked in conjunction with an advanced CloakEye sensor jammer that broadcast data bursts to disrupt enemy sensors and impede detection.
The "Blinder" 4B2 jamming array was first mentioned in the 2017 activity book Star Wars: A-wing Deluxe Book and 3D Wood Model, written by Michael Kogge.
